name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: National R&D Inc. Time Entry Extension
name.fr: National R&D Inc. Extension de la saisie du temps
name.it: National R&D Inc. Estensione dell'inserimento del tempo
name.pt_PT: Nacional R&D Inc. Prorrogação da Entrada de Tempo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter Clients and Task in Google Calendar
short.fr: Saisir les clients et les tâches dans Google Agenda
short.it: Inserire clienti e attività in Google Calendar
short.pt_PT: Entrar Clientes e Tarefas no Google Calendário

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension optimizes the process of adding events that require coded event titles to the google calendar. Using drop-down menus, the user specifies the properties of the task being done, the extension converts those properties into the codes that correspond to each property, pulling it from a Google Sheet. The extension then converts all the information into a previously specified format that combines those generated codes with some task names and dates, and creates an event on the user's calendar with a coded title that is useful for the company to do follow up on the work done and analytics of the time spent on each project/task.
